OurCitySongs.DESCRIPTION: Play: Bustle, Our Town NL Gain 1 level of Flight at the start of the performance. This card can ignore Rhythm . Consumption

BocchiAndPlanetSongs.NAME: Guitar & Loneliness & Blue Planet
BocchiAndPlanetSongs.DESCRIPTION: Play: Guitar & Loneliness & Blue Planet NL Gain 2 levels of cache at the start of the performance. This card can ignore Rhythm . Consumption

Mika.NAME: Betrayal
Mika.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be played Retain, when you draw this card, gain -5 Strength. Whenever you play an Attack card, if your Strength is less than 20, gain 1 Strength.

KarenRewardCard.NAME: Stage Girl Encore
KarenRewardCard.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be played, when you receive fatal damage, recover all HP and remove this card.

DustAnonRewards.NAME: Dusting Off!
DustAnonRewards.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, if you have played this card 5 times, gain an additional 100 Gold.
